topic.title: Conference Managment
topic.section: The Conference Manager's role is to manage conference in three main strands: (1) Setting up a conference website by {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.websiteManagement" text="Website Management"} and establishing a scheduled instance of the conference by {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.scheduledConferences" text="Scheduled Conferences"}; see {help_topic key="conference.generalManagement.index" text="General Management"}. (2) Building up that scheduled conference in all aspects started from {help_topic key="conference.currentConferences.setup" text="Setup"}; see {help_topic key="conference.currentConferences.index" text="Current Conferences"}. (3) Administering users in a variety of roles for running the conference; see {help_topic key="conference.users.index" text="Users"} and {help_topic key="conference.roles.index" text="Roles"}.
